      • CalculatePriceForEntryByOrder

        public float CalculatePriceForEntryByOrder(int TotalVisitors,
                                           int numberOfSubscribers,
                                           boolean isGroup,
                                           java.sql.Timestamp orderTime)
        Calculate the price of the order in advance

        Rules:
        numberOfSubscribers >= 1
        TotalVisitors >= numberOfSubscribers
        numberOfSubscribers counted inside TotalVisitors
        The instructor counted inside TotalVisitors if Group

        Parameters:
        TotalVisitors - all the visitors !including! the instructor and the subscribers (if has)
        numberOfSubscribers - the number of subscriber from total amount of visitors
        isGroup - to implement the appropriate discounts
        orderTime - for adding additional discounts if exists
        Returns:
        return the price after discounts

      • CalculatePriceForEntryCasual

        public float CalculatePriceForEntryCasual(int TotalVisitors,
                                          int numberOfSubscribers,
                                          boolean isGroup)
        Calculate the price of the order in advance

        Rules:
        numberOfSubscribers >= 1
        TotalVisitors >= numberOfSubscribers
        numberOfSubscribers counted inside TotalVisitors
        The instructor counted inside TotalVisitors if Group

        Parameters:
        TotalVisitors - all the visitors !including! the instructor and the subscribers (if has)
        numberOfSubscribers - the number of subscriber from total amount of visitors
        isGroup - to implement the appropriate discounts
        Returns:
        return the price after discounts

      • ApplyDiscount

        private float ApplyDiscount(float currentPrice,
                            java.sql.Timestamp orderTime)
        Search and apply maximal discount if there is for time of the order
        Parameters:
        currentPrice - the price before applying discount
        orderTime - time of the order for checking if there is discount for the time of order
        Returns:
        if succeeded will return the final price after applying discount
